abstract: In this paper, some new connectivity concepts in fuzzy labeling graphs are defined. The concepts of strong arc, partial cutnode, bridge and block are introduced. A new type of fuzzy labeling graphs called ï¿½-fuzzy labeling graphs is defined. Likewise, this paper generalizes the tree concept in fuzzy labeling graph, which plays a crucial role in many areas of science and technology.
meta: December 2015Journal of Intelligent and Fuzzy Systems 30(6)
